Trade/Device Name(s): Fastect® II BUP Drug Screen Dipstick
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Fastect II BUP Drug Screen Dipstick and QuickTox Drug Screen Dipcard for qualitative detection of Buprenorphine in urine using immunochromatographic assay
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid immunochromatographic assays for qualitative detection of Buprenorphine in human urine at 10 ng/mL cutoff, intended for professional use only as a screening device with positive results requiring confirmation by alternate methods
